browsermonkey.render
Class TransparentTagRenderer

java.lang.Object
  browsermonkey.render.TagRenderer
      browsermonkey.render.TransparentTagRenderer

public class TransparentTagRenderer
extends TagRenderer

Renders a TagDocumentNode's children into the document in place; the effect of the node itself is transparent.

Description copied from class: TagRenderer
Renders the given tag into the parent, taking into account the current formatting. Uses the given renderer for utility methods and rendering children.
